greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=1} 1/Fibonacci(2*n).
link: A. F. Horadam, Elliptic Functions and Lambert Series in the Summation of Reciprocals in Certain Recurrence-Generated Sequences, The Fibonacci Quarterly, Vol. 26, No. 2 (1988), pp. 98-114.
formula: Equals sqrt(5) * (L((3-sqrt(5))/2) - L((7-3*sqrt(5))/2)), where L(x) = Sum_{k>=1} x^k/(1-x^k) (Horadam, 1988). - _Amiram Eldar_, Oct 04 2020
mathematica: rd[k_] := rd[k] = RealDigits[ N[ Sum[ 1/Fibonacci[2*n], {n, 1, 2^k}], 105]][[1]]; rd[k = 4]; While[ rd[k] != rd[k - 1], k++]; rd[k] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 29 2012 *)
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Dec 25 2008
